labs.title: Terraform Sandbox
labs.description: Experiment with Terraform. This sandbox includes Docker and LocalStack preinstalled to test your Terraform configuration.

labs.title: Vault Sandbox
labs.description: Experiment with Vault. This sandbox contains five Vault Docker containers, a reverse proxy container, Grafana, and Prometheus.

labs.title: Boundary Sandbox
labs.description: Experiment with Boundary. This sandbox contains a Boundary cluster (one controller server and one worker) configured with a Boundary target (Ubuntu 24.04) and a Postgres database.

labs.title: Consul Sandbox (Service discovery)
labs.description: Experiment with Consul. This sandbox contains a Consul cluster (3 servers and 4 clients) and a Bastion host. It also runs HashiCups, a demo web application.

labs.title: Consul Sandbox (Service mesh)
labs.description: Experiment with Consul. This sandbox contains a Consul cluster (3 servers and 4 clients) and a Bastion host. It also runs HashiCups, a demo web application.

labs.title: Nomad Sandbox
labs.description: Experiment with Nomad. This sandbox contains a Nomad cluster with one server and one client node with TLS and ACLs enabled.
